LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_AssaultArmor.label: HAP armor
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_AssaultArmor.description: A heavy armor designed to protect wearer from bullets and shrapnel during direct assault operations./n/nAlso provides vacuum exposure resistance.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_JumperArmor.label: HAPJ armor
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_JumperArmor.description: A heavy armor designed to protect wearer from bullets and shrapnel during direct assault operations./n/nAlso provides vacuum exposure resistance.
